publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3022.2 Nicola Sturgeon: Modernising Primary Care in NHS Scotland to Improve Health-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3022) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end "including greater devolution of power and resources to Local Health Care Co-operatives to support and empower primary care teams." Supported by: Shona Robison*
